title: Callback-based story generation test framework
description: Implement callback-driven test framework for asynchronous story generation to validate system behavior under concurrent operations and ensure proper event handling during bulk story creation workflows
iWant: to test story generation using callback patterns for asynchronous operations
soThat: I can verify system stability and data integrity during concurrent story creation and bulk operations
acceptanceCriteria: Framework supports callback registration for story generation events
System handles concurrent story creation without data corruption
Callbacks execute in proper sequence during bulk generation operations
Error callbacks provide detailed failure information and recovery options
Test suite validates callback timing and execution order under load
technicalNotes: Implement Promise-based callbacks with proper error handling. Include timing validation and race condition detection.
